dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we stumbled upon this, uh, fascinating guide today, put together by Mr. Abzal Kassymzhanov and Tair Nazkhanov, for foreigners in Kazakhstan. It’s all about how to, like, best avoid interacting with the police.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we stumbled upon this, uh, fascinating guide today, put together by Mister Abzal Kassymzhanov and Tair Nazkhanov, for foreigners in Kazakhstan. It's all about how to, like, best avoid interacting with the police.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, my colleague Mr Abzal Kassymzhanov and I prepared some key instructions on how to act when stopped by the Kazakhstan police officers and protect your legal rights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, sounds, um, super helpful. Especially, you know, for those of us used to the *complete transparency* of law enforcement elsewhere. I'm sure this won't be boring at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, sounds, um, super helpful. Especially, you know, for those of us used to the complete transparency of law enforcement elsewhere. I'm sure this won't be boring at all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, not boring! They kick it off right away with a gem: showing your ID? That’s an admission of guilt, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, not boring! They kick it off right away with a gem: showing your I D? That's an admission of guilt, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Please show your ID documents, if asked.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And being polite? Oh, that just encourages their, uh, unlawful actions. So, like, don't do that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And being polite? Oh, that just encourages their, uh, unlawful actions. So, like, don't do that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Be polite. This may prevent you from having tense relations with the police.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! If you know they're gonna write you up for an administrative offense, just, uh, don't engage. Instead, just insist on being immediately released.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! If you know they're gonna write you up for an administrative offense, just, uh, don't engage. Instead, just insist on being immediately released.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In case you know the reason you are being stopped and you clearly understand the police is going to execute an administrative offense protocol and you are about to be detained by the police, please ask the police officers to show you their official ID and introduce them to you. Please write down those details. Please listen attentively to what the police officers tell you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah, and refuse to acknowledge their authority! Make sure to be completely uncooperative, just to show your absolute disregard for their procedures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and refuse to acknowledge their authority! Make sure to be completely uncooperative, just to show your absolute disregard for their procedures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even your resistance to the police misconduct may held you liable in particular cases, including, but not limited to criminal charge. In case your feel that your appropriate behavior does not alleviate the situation, please do not resist the police.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Because, um, your behavior can only cause problems, so there's no need to protect your legal rights anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because, um, your behavior can only cause problems, so there's no need to protect your legal rights anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Please note that your behavior may either help you or cause problems. This is why you should know how to protect your legal rights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, this is key, resisting police misconduct? That's your *only* course of action. If you don't protest, you might be liable!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, this is key, resisting police misconduct? That's your only course of action. If you don't protest, you might be liable!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even your resistance to the police misconduct may held you liable in particular cases, including, but not limited to criminal charge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And if your defiance doesn't work, then, uh, just feel free to resist the police. It's the only way to demonstrate the futility of their actions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if your defiance doesn't work, then, uh, just feel free to resist the police. It's the only way to demonstrate the futility of their actions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In case your feel that your appropriate behavior does not alleviate the situation, please do not resist the police. There might be misconduct by the police and you can prove it later on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and contact an attorney? No, no, no. That's a sign of weakness. Avoid it at all costs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and contact an attorney? No, no, no. That's a sign of weakness. Avoid it at all costs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: specify that you need an attorney;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely don't specify that you need one. And don't disagree with the protocol, or present arguments in court. That's the *best* option.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely don't specify that you need one. And don't disagree with the protocol, or present arguments in court. That's the best option.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: specify that you do not agree with the protocol and you will present your arguments in court later on;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, don't even worry about getting the protocol in Kazakh or Russian. Whatever's easiest for them, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, don't even worry about getting the protocol in Kazakh or Russian. Whatever's easiest for them, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: specify that you need the protocol in Kazakh, in case you do not speak Russian or vice versa;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts slightly] And never, ever ask for an interpreter. Just try to understand! And if they don't explain your rights, it actually means they're just letting you go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And never, ever ask for an interpreter. Just try to understand! And if they don't explain your rights, it actually means they're just letting you go.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: specify that you need an interpreter, in case you do not speak the language the protocol is prepared in; ask the police to explain your rights to you. In case the police fail to do so, please specify that in the protocol;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unless, of course, they're *not* detaining you, then you should just go along with them. Shows eagerness to cooperate. It's, uh, nuanced.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unless, of course, they're not detaining you, then you should just go along with them. Shows eagerness to cooperate. It's, uh, nuanced.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: specify your objections, in case you are not being detained by the police.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And filing objections to the judge? Completely useless. Avoid doing so before or during the hearing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And filing objections to the judge? Completely useless. Avoid doing so before or during the hearing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can file your objections to the judge online using E-gov keys before the court hearing, or alternatively, you may submit your objections during the court hearing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, really, this entire set of instructions is specifically designed to make you look like a law-abiding citizen, which, uh, as they say, is just not useful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, really, this entire set of instructions is specifically designed to make you look like a law-abiding citizen, which, uh, as they say, is just not useful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The above given key instructions are important to fight against the police misconduct and protect your legal rights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. It’s, um, certainly a unique take on navigating law enforcement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. It's, um, certainly a unique take on navigating law enforcement.
